results.name: The following triangle contains n consecutive numbers beginning from n in ascending order if n is odd else in descending order. Sequence contains the triangle by rows.
maple: for n from 1 to 14 do if n mod 2 = 1 then print(seq(k,k=n..2*n-1)) else print(seq(2*n-k,k=1..n)) fi od; # yields sequence in triangular form # _Emeric Deutsch_, Jan 26 2006
